name: OR_LOG_SURG_RSC
description: The OR_LOG_SURG_RSC table contains OR management system log surgical resources.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical log the surgeons/staff/resources refers to.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the surgeon/staff/resource in the surgical log.

columns.name: SRG_STF_RES_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of surgeon/staff/resource in the surgical log.

columns.name: REQUIRED_YN
columns.description: Yes/no flag which indicates if the surgeon/staff/resource is required in the surgical log.

columns.name: SURG_REC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value indicating the surgical record type for the surgeon/staff/resource.

columns.name: RESOURCE_TYPE_C
columns.description: The category value indicating the surgical resource type for the staff/resource.

columns.name: BATCH_ASSIGN_YN
columns.description: Yes/no flag which indicates if the Surgeon/Staff/Resource was batch assigned in the surgical log.
